title: Hedgehogs
description: Hedgehogs introduces students to the fascinating world of hedgehogs. Students will learn all about these quill-covered mammals, including their habitats, diets, family structure, and more! Detailed photographs and high-frequency words support emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing as well as to connect to prior knowledge to better understand a text.
meta: burrows, hares, hedgehogs, insects, mammals, quills
